amendment.description: To increase appropriations for workforce investment activities.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 108 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 24.
Motion to table amendment SA 108 made in Senate.
Amendment SA 108 proposed by Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S1409-1411, S1418; text: CR S1409) To increase appropriations for workforce investment activities.
